mapper.insert: insert into BOARD(MNUMBER, KINDOFBOARD, TITLE, CONTENT, IMGPATH, VIDEO, WRTIME, CHECKPUBLIC) values (#{mNumber}, #{kindOfBoard}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imgPath}, #{video}, #{wrTime}, #{checkPublic})
mapper.select: select M.NAME from BOARD B inner join MEMBER M on B.MNUMBER = M.MNUMBER where B.BNUMBER = #{pk}
